about_the_game:
Battle Map Studio is a playful map editor and RPG sandbox that makes world building fun, simple, and social. Use a variety of practical and amusing tools to paint forests and rivers, generate mountains, and construct houses. Build solo or collaborate with multiple players in real time online to bring your world to life!

With a growing collection of props, furniture pieces, and items to build with, you can let your imagination run wild while decorating castles, inns, and dungeons. When you’re finished building, set the mood and time of day using the light and fog controls. Then, populate your world with characters and creatures to set the stage for playing RPG campaigns.

With Battle Map Studio, you can...


  • Paint elevation, trees, and rocks, with a resizable brush, paint bucket, blaster, or draggable area.
  • Build in Column or Voxel mode.
  • Change scene lighting, fog, and time of day.
  • Build multistory forts and dungeons and furnish them with a variety of props.
  • Work in square or hex coordinates.
  • Scale, rotate, and reposition props and characters.
  • Quickly create rooms, tiles, and entrances with the auto-room tool.
  • Experiment with fun and procedural tools to generate large environments in a flash.
  • Export environment block geometry as a 3D model.


  • Join up with friends online to build maps together in real-time.
  • Connect your Hero Forge account and import minis.
  • Import your own custom models to use as characters or props (FBX, OBJ, STL, and .unity3d).
  • Import image files to use as 2D props or character tokens (PNG and JPG).
  • Share your maps on the Steam Workshop.
  • Play Battle Map Studio on Tilt Five™.


  • Place characters and monsters that can move and attack.
  • Roll 3D dice and automatically add up rolls.
  • Create and edit character sheets for tabletop role-playing games.
  • Use the fog of war system for team-only line of sight.
  • Snap top-down screenshots of maps for printing or using with other tabletop simulators.
  • Assign player roles like GM and player to better facilitate campaigns.
detailed_description:
Play on Tilt Five™


New! Battle Map Studio now supports multiple Tilt Five headsets! Connect up to 4 headsets and wands on one device.

Battle Map Studio officially supports Tilt Five™! With the Tilt Five™ Wand as your brush, painting landscapes, building civilizations, and maneuvering characters become much more immersive. Watch your mountains rise, characters battle, and jungles grow right in front of you in holographic 3D. Gather your friends around the board to build a map or play a tabletop RPG together.


Custom Asset Import


Bring your own models and images to place as characters and props in your Battle Map Studio environment! FBX, OBJ, STL, Asset Bundle (.unity3d), PNG, and JPG are all supported.

There are so many great sites for downloading 3D models and 2D battle map assets. The model in the left-most section of this GIF was made using Hero Forge and the model in the center was downloaded from Unity Asset Store. The images in the third section were downloaded from 2-Minute Tabletop.


Map Layers


Add layers to your map to build multistory buildings, floating islands, or underground tunnels! Then, add additional layers to stack props on top of tables and other surfaces. Move layers up and down, duplicate them for easy reuse, or set them invisible to obscure parts of the map.
